lenders.name: Anna
lenders.loan_because: Before having children, my husband and I met many wonderful people traveling and these loans seem like a good way to help them better themselves. I am drawn in by the pictures and stories of the borrowers. I like building a diverse portfolio, but  particularly look for loans in SE Asia and Pharmacy/Healthcare.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people with their medications. I am a mom to 2 children, ages 7 and 11.

lenders.name: Natasha
lenders.loan_because: It feels good

lenders.name: Janet
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy giving hardworking people around the world a chance to make a better life for themselves.
lenders.occupational_info:
I'm a retired software engineer.  Currently I tutor high school students with their schoolwork and also help them prepare for their university entrance examinations.  I enjoy quilting in my spare time. My focus is sponsoring fabric, sewing, tailoring and educational loans.

My younger sister is also a kiva lender: http://www.kiva.org/lender/anna9149

lenders.name: Robin
lenders.loan_because: To think such a small loan on my part  can make so big a difference in somebody's life.

lenders.name: Elizabeth
lenders.loan_because: I have volunteered in Uganda, Rwanda, Kenya and the Democratic Republic of Congo. This is a family I met outside Goma, DRC. Once you have experienced their determination and strength, in the face of poverty and danger, you are forever changed, in the best of ways.
lenders.occupational_info: Attorney and Entrepreneur.  Trusts, wills, elder law, and tax exempt organizations.

lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference in the lives under-privilege women and children............
lenders.occupational_info: Working towards sustainable economic progress. Professionally I am responsible for reducing the environmental impact of consumer electronics in our lives. Personally, I aspire towards inclusive progress - especially for people traditionally left behind.

lenders.name: Jimmy & Christy
lenders.loan_because: we believe that everyone should have an equal opportunity to support their families and/or realize their dreams. We are working toward those same goals here in the US, and have nothing but respect and admiration for Kiva members who are looking for not a hand-out, but a hand-up.
lenders.occupational_info: Jimmy works as a retail store manager, and is a full time college student. Christy is a stay at home Mom who is on the path to opening her own photography studio.

lenders.name: PeopleFud

lenders.name: Dana
lenders.loan_because: As a former Kiva fellow, I was inspired to not only make a career out of microfinance but keep it personal. I now work with a similar peer-to-peer lending model based in Chicago that works with donations to keep funding in-country for accelerated development.

lenders.name: Caroline
lenders.loan_because: It makes me happy and I like knowing that I can make a difference (even if it is in a very small way).

lenders.name: Rick

I have been fortunate in my life and wish to help others help make a better life for themselves.  

I  sincerely believe in what Sir Winston Churchill once said-> "We make a living by what we get, but we make a life by what we give".

.

lenders.name: Hans
lenders.loan_because:
It gives me a good feeling to support people who needed it and I think that this is a verry effective way.

lenders.occupational_info:
Kasia: I'm Polish, living in Japan. For work I make websites, like this (Kiva) one. I take photos of nature and animals too. 
Takashi: I'm Japanese, I work as a network setting manager.

lenders.name: Beth
lenders.loan_because: I want to help other women succeed in their lives, which will affect the lives of their family and friends. Pay it forward

lenders.name: John

lenders.name: Yonny
lenders.loan_because:
Mi necesidad primordialmente es la adquisicion de un computador portatil marca ("ipod"o "hp") de 2 gigas y de 160 de disco duro, pantalla de 13 pulgadas de aproximadamente US 1500 americanos para poder llevar mis registros contables y de  ventas  más en orden, como a la vez estar en continuo contacto con mis clientes y proveedores, ya que me generan la manera de sostenerme, y a la vez tener una conexion con el mundo exterior.
es una actividad que he consolidado atraves de los años y actualmente me da un nivel de sostenimiento, por ello es de grande necesidad la adquisicion de esta maquina por ello doy muchas gracias a la persona que me pueda dar la mano o apoyar para adquirirlo ya que no tengo capacidad de comprarlo por mis propios medios,,muchas gracias...
lenders.occupational_info: Mi actividad comercial  actual, radica en la comercializacion al por menor de todo tipo de mercancia, en especial perfumeria francesa y americana, visitando en la localidad en la cual vivo,"Bucaramanga" clientes en oficinas, empresas, negocios, que adquieren mis productos de una manera personalizada, este tipo de actividad, la he realizado en los ultimos  7 años la cual me genera un rublo para sostenimiento personal y familiar ya que vivo, con mis padres

lenders.name: moncef
lenders.loan_because: i need help for living

lenders.name: Geraldine
lenders.loan_because: We are all responsible for each other and this is a great way for me to help others.
lenders.occupational_info: All of the waste that goes into the local sewers flows to the plant where I work. I help to ensure the the waste is removed and the water is clean before it goes to the creek.

lenders.name: Mary
lenders.loan_because: I want to have my future business for my little girl when she grows up and be proud of me. I want to help my daddy and my mommy because whent they get old and nobody takes care of them while they are here and lastly I want to help people around me who needs my help at the same time with the helping hand of KIVA ORG. These my that I really want to full fill in my life before GOD will take me.

lenders.name: Soledad
lenders.loan_because: I came from a third world country and I know what is is like! This is a great reminder of how blessed I am.
lenders.occupational_info: I have three beautiful children and amazing husband.

lenders.name: Katie
lenders.loan_because: I'm a student, and therefore I don't have a lot of money.  However, I can be a part of a support system for another human being who just wants the same opportunities that I have to be independently successful.
lenders.occupational_info: I help business owners by giving them the chance to gain financial autonomy and self-determination.

lenders.name: Debra
lenders.loan_because: I grew up poor by US standards but I have visited other countries and realize that I had much by world standards.  Dignity and respect are more important than charity.
lenders.occupational_info: Office work

lenders.name: Udo
lenders.loan_because: I like this idea and the small projects that help people so much.

lenders.name: Patricia
lenders.loan_because: I want to be more connected with people around the world and help others achieve their goals in life, as I've tried to do through teaching.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach History and Sociology to college students of all ages and backgrounds.

lenders.name: Ruth
lenders.loan_because: Me and my mum want to make a difference in the world, even just a little bit.
lenders.occupational_info: I sit at my computer and hope for inspiration -when that doesn't work I write as much as I can and then edit all the worst bits out!

lenders.name: Laura
lenders.loan_because:
I lend because I can.

" Do not wait for leaders; do it alone, person to person"

Mother Theresa
lenders.occupational_info: I help people buy homes by working with a bank to lend them money.

lenders.name: Pat and Jim
lenders.loan_because: It makes us feel great to help someone far away.  To be able to insure their children's future.  To be able to educate them and improve their lives.  Our own children do not need much financial help anymore.  It feels good to offer someone a better future.
lenders.occupational_info: we don't work at a job anymore.  I used to be a supervisor at a printing facility within General Motors and my husband used to do computer work.  Now we play with our grand children and try to have fun in our lives.

lenders.name: Jim
lenders.loan_because: I think not all aid to the poor needs to come thru mega-charities or governmental agencies. There are other niches of need and Kiva has addressed one in an innovative way. I like that I can connect to an individual - know their name, their face and a little about their life.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a graphic designer. I design everything from book covers to billboards.

lenders.name: Magdalena
lenders.loan_because: Everyone needs a chance

lenders.name: Nils Lipecki
lenders.loan_because: Because I belive that grassroot development is preferable to charity.

lenders.name: Donna
lenders.loan_because: I am a entrepreneur and I know how hard it is to get people to help me.   When I saw what you all have done I thought I could give atless $25 to help.
lenders.occupational_info: I photograph family portraits,children,weddings,entertainer,tv,magazines,sports,movies,working on a couple of books
I

lenders.name: N, J, and family

lenders.occupational_info: computer software/hardware, urban planner, our children are college and high school students.

lenders.name: Cavalier FBLA

lenders.loan_because: I care.

lenders.name: Irene

lenders.name: Simona&Gerard
lenders.loan_because: It is a great way to help great people !

lenders.name: First Congregational Church UCC
lenders.loan_because: Our Christian faith compels us to love and care for others and to share the blessings we are given by God.
lenders.occupational_info: United Church of Christ in Waterville, Maine, USA

lenders.name: Neil
lenders.loan_because: I want everyone to have the chance at a better life. This is my way of giving someone else that chance..

lenders.name: Violeta
lenders.loan_because: Clothing sales
lenders.occupational_info: I show the clothes to my customers in their houses or sometime in my house

lenders.name: Markus Amanto
lenders.loan_because: I believe work is love in action. I believe sites like Kiva empower people. When we spread more love and empowerment the world becomes a better place for our children.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people develop their potential in life, business and relationships.

lenders.name: Meredith
lenders.loan_because: Even though I'm barely getting by myself, I can spare $50/yr to make a difference in this world.
lenders.occupational_info: I tell stories through plays, music and live performance.

lenders.name: Ingrid
lenders.loan_because: I work full-time and also attend school at nights to get my MBA.  I've been trying for a very long time to figure out a way to help others without the time commitment that ...  - in all sincerity - I do not have at the moment.  Because I am originally from Costa Rica I understand the difficulties some of these individuals go through in their own countries to get above poverty levels.  I'm so glad I heard about Kiva!  Thanks to all of you who have supported this program and thanks to the individuals who spearheaded Kiva...  Hopefully I'll be able to see sponsors from Costa Rica very soon…
lenders.occupational_info: I work with the Finance and Information Systems department in my company to help bring about technology-based solutions to the business issues the company faces every day.

lenders.name: Kathleen
lenders.loan_because: I spent my career working for US AID, and learned how important microcredit loans can be.  Besides that, it makes  me feel good.
lenders.occupational_info: I spned a lot of time volunteering my services.  My favorite acitivies are giving tours of historical sites and museums.

lenders.name: Terence
lenders.loan_because: "The best time to plant a tree was 20 years ago.  The next best time is now." ~Chinese Proverb

lenders.name: Travis and Elaine
lenders.loan_because: We never go to bed with the worry of putting food on the table, or a roof over our heads, but we remember what it feels like.
lenders.occupational_info: We write stories for the movies, we take pictures and we develop content for the internet,

lenders.name: Deb
lenders.loan_because: it's a great way to help change people's lives a little at a time.
lenders.occupational_info: As the writer of "Wordplay", the official blog of The New York Times crossword puzzle, I am the online voice of of puzzle solvers around the world. I also construct crosswords for The Onion and BUST Magazine, and am a humor writer whose book "It's Not PMS, It's You" (Sterling) is available where all fine literature is sold.

lenders.name: Cheryl Sultan
lenders.loan_because: My wish is for a world filled with love, peace and prosperity.  My passion is helping women in Nicaragua, as this is part of my heritage and I have seen first hand the poverty that exists in this country. No child should die of starvation, ever.

lenders.name: Philippe
lenders.loan_because: I'm convinced of the need and of the solution
lenders.occupational_info: I'm working on imaging solution for mobile phone.

lenders.name: Bhanu Mullapudi
lenders.loan_because: Its not a give away, its lending. The people who receive money have responsibility to payback, which I think makes them powerful and gives a lasting support, unlike one-time charity benefit.
lenders.occupational_info: I design software for computers. I enable innovation at work.

lenders.name: Vikki
lenders.loan_because: Everyone needs a little help sometime in their lives. And to be able to repay that help by helping others, is what it's all about.

lenders.name: Students at OU
lenders.occupational_info: We are a marketing class at Oakland University, MI.

lenders.name: Kendra
lenders.loan_because: I know that I'm fortunate to live where I do and to have the resources that I have.  I want to help other women to succeed as well.

lenders.name: Alesia
lenders.loan_because: It's a Beautiful thing to give!

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: my mom says its a good thing to do. I can help people who don't have much money in other parts of the world.

lenders.name: Jeremy
lenders.loan_because: a North American dollar goes farther in a developing nation.

lenders.name: Maxshi
lenders.loan_because: Even a small amount can change a life.

lenders.occupational_info: en la actividad agricola y pecuaria ya que poseo una finca pequeña y desearia invertir en la compra de ganado al destete en un plazo de 365 dias

lenders.loan_because: We are family.

lenders.name: Catherine
lenders.loan_because: I have so much: they have so little
lenders.occupational_info: I help dying people to live until they die

lenders.name: Jeannine & John
lenders.loan_because: we can.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a Software Engineer, and John is s social work who supports homeless people in Denver.

lenders.name: Ann & Dana
lenders.loan_because: Helping to pass it along!
lenders.occupational_info: We paint houses, inside and out.  We also invest in real estate on a small scale with rental houses and flipping houses.

lenders.name: Connie
lenders.loan_because: I could not pass up the opportunity to personally help someone become self-sufficient.  What an incredible chance to support women around the world to be successful in business.  Thank you Kiva!
lenders.occupational_info: As a Financial Advisor / Trust Officer, I manage investment accounts in varying degrees.  It can be as simple as administering funds wherever directed, or as a Trustee, I may be responsible for paying bills and determining how much money a beneficiary will receive.  It is a rewarding occupation with the opportunity to meet and work with a variety of people.

lenders.name: Keith & Kay
lenders.loan_because: We've been very fortunate to get to follow our hearts.  We want to help others do the same.
lenders.occupational_info:
Keith: musician, retired Music Professor
Kay: Pilates instructor, Adjunct Professor at Belmont University

lenders.name: Glenn
lenders.loan_because: Feels good to help people move themselves forward on their terms.

lenders.name: Judith
lenders.loan_because: I like the idea of helping people start businesses and sustain their families in good health. I think private assistance is more efficient than government assistance. This is the what USAID should be about.
lenders.occupational_info: I did research and managed large projects involving military logistics, air and rail safety.  I left government after many years and now have an active social and intellectual life. With university degrees in international relations, I love to travel, learn and experience other cultures.

lenders.name: Valery
lenders.loan_because: Giving back to people who are trying to achieve their dreams and goals  in life.  You can wins!
lenders.occupational_info:
I work with kids who have low scores in school, my efforts are to help them raised, achieve and go further.
Never giving up to learn, failure is not an option.

lenders.name: Dr. Patrick Mendis
lenders.loan_because: These courageous micro-entrepreneurs remind me that I was like one of them when I was growing up with 13 water-buffaloes on a three-acre rice field in Sri Lanka.  I know the value of micro-loan, which helped my family to break-away from the cycle of poverty caused by poor rice harvest, unpredictable monsoon, or simply being poor.  A small loan could transform a person, a family, a village, and a nation.
lenders.occupational_info: As an AFS (American Field Service) scholar I came to Minnesota in 1978 to study. After my government service in Washington, I returned to academia. Now I am an affiliate professor of public and international affairs at George Mason University. With the sales of my recent books, I established a number of tsunami scholarships and a Peace Prize in Sri Lanka.  All proceeds after income tax are donated to charity and micro-finance programs. [Photo: With Jessica Jackley Flannery, the co-founder of Kiva at the U.S. Chamber of Commerce in Washington, DC].

lenders.name: Farzana Kashfi
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference, however small...
lenders.occupational_info: I work to empower adolescent girls, living in rural Bangladesh

lenders.name: The Merringers
lenders.loan_because: We want our children to live in the best world possible.
lenders.occupational_info: I stay home to raise our two sons, while my husband sells sporting equipment.

lenders.name: Linda
lenders.loan_because: I was born in the right place and the right time. I've been lucky.

lenders.name: Chanah & Nicholas
lenders.loan_because: I like to contribute my part in making this world a better place for others.
lenders.occupational_info: Project Manager for a major Pharmaceutical Company

lenders.name: Andrea
lenders.loan_because: I want to change the world little by little

lenders.name: Cynthia
lenders.occupation: Retired attorney and retired ESL teacher
lenders.loan_because: it's a wonderful way to help others provide for  themselves and their families.
lenders.occupational_info: As a volunteer attorney I help immigrants in the United States with their immigration-related legal problems.

lenders.name: Marie
lenders.loan_because: I like the idea of an organization like Kiva, that can connect people across oceans and between continents.  Living in such an economically blessed country, I feel an obligation to give back however I can, and this provides an amazing opportunity to do so!
lenders.occupational_info: I study at a university in the United States, and am planning to get an undergraduate degree in History and Spanish soon!

lenders.name: Allen
lenders.loan_because: God has blessed me, and I am happy to share that blessing with others. May God, through his son Jesus Christ bless all who look to him for their needs.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach 17 and 18 year old students about government, business and money.

lenders.name: Roseann
lenders.loan_because: A little sharing can make a huge difference.

lenders.name: Tonja
lenders.loan_because: There are so many people out on the street asking for money.  Loaning money for someone to better themselves seems right and good.

lenders.name: Patty
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people who are helping themselves.

lenders.name: Brian
lenders.loan_because: I want to give other people the chance to start their own business. I started my own business and understand how hard it is to raise money for tools/supplies.
lenders.occupational_info: I record sound for TV shows, commercials and documentaries.

lenders.name: San
lenders.loan_because: Micro loans make a difference.  A little from me make a difference in present and future for individuals and their families.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people plan and manage their investment savings so that they can live their desired financial future.

lenders.name: Kathleen
lenders.loan_because: I believe in this. I want to help other people be empowered. I have had times in my life when I have needed help, and now it's my turn to give back - and I do so very happily!
lenders.occupational_info:
I am a change agent. Right now my job is working on changing my thoughts and beliefs about myself and the world I live in to positive ones that bring me peace and joy!

And for everyone requesting loans - I say go for it!! Grab onto your idea and don't let go. You can do it!!

lenders.name: motoko
lenders.occupational_info: housewife

lenders.name: Alexandra
lenders.loan_because: God blesses me with the gift of lending.
lenders.occupational_info: I help guide students through school to get a college education.

lenders.name: Kate
lenders.loan_because: We need to create a world that works for everyone.
lenders.occupational_info: I try to make things beautiful.

lenders.name: Steve

lenders.name: Melissa

lenders.occupational_info: manager of an arts and crafts store

lenders.name: Jason
lenders.loan_because: Working as a Business Development Manager I can appreciate that these people know they need help.  Many people today think that they can do it on their own.  That may be true.  But what I know is true is that together we can do more.  As a person born and raised in the "west", I know we have been blessed by geography and economy.  My wife teaches many children who have come from places like Sudan.  They were born in to places where civil war, poverty, and strife is common place.  The least we can do to help our fellow humans is use a service like KIVA and give someone a hand up.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with retail flooring stores and our company provides business solutions for them.  Such as products, pricing, promotion and financial benefits.

lenders.name: Tim
lenders.loan_because: It's great way to share the blessings I've been given with others.

lenders.name: Sherry
lenders.loan_because: I raised 4 children as a divorcee. I "reinvented" myself several times in an effort to better provide for my family.  I have been a Master Plumber and Electrician, went to nursing school in my 40's, and am now becoming a personal fitness trainer with a gym in my home.  I resigned my RN position to stay at home and care for my adult profoundly retarded and handicapped son.  I have been praying for money to operate my own business.  I suddenly felt selfish when I thought of the many others who have never had the chance to better their lives.  I hope my small loan will make a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I provide full time care to my 40 year old son who is profoundly retarded and handicapped. I have purchased fitness equipment, am becoming certified as a fitness instructor and will operate a home business that offers personal fitness training. and nutritional consultation. In our country we have a great number of people who do not toil daily and have the need to improve their physical health.

lenders.name: Tina
